## Why was data driven decision making (3DM) useful in this business case?

The company has over 120 million members globally. Their content also very diverse and differ per country. The data is used in how they compose their catalog, how they produce their content, and how they encode and stream it

## How did the organization apply 3DM?

The data is used in how they compose their catalog, how they produce their content, and how they encode and stream it. The data is also used for content acquisition. They look at the gaps at current offering and what titles might be interesting to them.

## What can the organization do with 3DM that they couldnâ€™t do before?

They use the data to optimize the production of Netflix Original series. E.g. House of Cards. They have noticed that fans of the UK version, also enjoyed watching movies with Kevin Spacey as lead. Also, they noticed that they showed a preference for director David Fincher. Netflix combined these three and created House of Cards.
This is also used when it comes to new original content, where data is used to create new Netflix Original shows, optimized for their audience.
